thread.title: LineStream Technologies and Danfoss Drives Announce Strategic Partnership
thread.title_full: LineStream Technologies and Danfoss Drives Announce Strategic Partnership

author: David Neundorfer
title: LineStream Technologies and Danfoss Drives Announce Strategic Partnership
text:
LineStream Technologies Inc., an innovator of software-based control solutions for the industrial automation sector, announced today that Danfoss Drives will leverage LineStream’s industry-leading software across its product portfolio. This partnership will provide Danfoss Drives customers with performance advantages and superior tools that simplify product commissioning and maintenance. Danfoss provides state of the art products across a broad range of applications, including motor drives, compressors, pumps and industrial automation equipment. LineStream offers modular software that simplifies application commissioning while unlocking high performance. With the seamless integration between LineStream’s software and Danfoss’ product portfolio, the partners expect to launch their first product before year’s end.
“This partnership is a direct response to customer demands for a more sophisticated, easier to use product infrastructure,” said Vesa Laisi, president of Danfoss Drives. With today’s controls, set-up is an imprecise trial-and-error process that demands extensive design and commissioning time, often resulting in costly support, lost production and suboptimal performance. “By combining Danfoss’ deep engineering and application expertise with LineStream’s advanced control software, we will address our customers’ traditional control design challenges and inefficiencies,” said Laisi.
“The scalability of LineStream’s software complements Danfoss’ breadth of industrial automated products,” said David Neundorfer, president and CEO of LineStream. The benefits of enhanced controls range from enhanced accuracy and energy efficiency to easier commissioning and more effective customer support. “Our goal is simple,” said Neundorfer, “make Danfoss the go-to brand for high-performance, hassle-free industrial solutions.”
About LineStream Technologies:
LineStream Technologies Inc. is a global leader in control technology for industrial and motor-controlled products. LineStream’s InTAC™ and SpinTAC™ tuning and control software optimize operational performance while providing an easy and intuitive implementation process. In partnership with leading controller providers, LineStream deploys its solutions into automated products ranging from blenders to cars to heavy manufacturing equipment. For more information, see http://www.linestream.com or contact info(at)linestream(dot)com.
About Danfoss:
Danfoss Drives is the world leader in dedicated drives. Drives are our business, our focus. Danfoss is independent of motor manufacturers and adapts to any motor technology. Our applied expertise and understanding of your business allows us to deliver dedicated, reliable and user-friendly products and services that fit your specific application requirements and reduce your total cost of ownership.
